short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you dislike the new YouTube layout? This add-on will swap the comments and videos back to where they were before 2024.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on edits the style of the YouTube page when playing a video to resemble the layout from before the layout update of 2024. However, the style will not be exactly the same. If you want to report bugs, or request a feature, please write an Issue on GitHub
